title: Adam Bede - complex views on leisure

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Eliot uses literary elements and techniques to convey her complex views on “old Leisure” and on leisure in the society of her own time.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Eliot uses literary elements and techniques to convey her complex views on “old Leisure” and on leisure in the society of her own time.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
